Reviews.Title: She loves it.
Reviews.Author: rockymtnnomad "rockymtnnomad"
Reviews.Content: It works for her. Uses the dual sim feature for personal and business. Likes the pink color too. She's happy, I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Color is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Little Horse "Little Horse"
Reviews.Content: I love that you can get phones in so many colors. I love purple and have a case that also reflects this. Its not the typical black so it stands out. Small and slim, light weight and easy to use. Minimal apps on this unlike a branded phone, so it has more memory starting out, close to the 8 gb as expected. I expanded it to 64 so yay! I have played with this a few days and I am in love with android, so glad to be free of the fruit empire!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Jannette Fernandez
Reviews.Content: I just received my new mini samguns s4 and am very excited. They are very competent and their products are excellent. thanks

Reviews.Title: NOT UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: Mcsand
Reviews.Content: The set I received is not unlocked  because when I start up the phone it ask for the SIM Pin which I enter and then it ask for " SIM Network PIN " which I do not have nor do the Network , called  STC..

Reviews.Title: Love my new phone.
Reviews.Author: Mary.J
Reviews.Content: Great Android phone. Works great with straight talk just buy yourself a micro sim and you are set. I would like to know if the menu and back buttons change color from the red if anyone knows this please let me know thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Kristine Bolt "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I'm loving my new phone. My only problem is the battery life. I constantly have to charge it. I did a battery pull and things have improved since then but it's still fairly frequent charging. Other than that, the phone is great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Johanna Rojas
Reviews.Content: I loved my new cell phone, more than I was expecting.  It came perfectly conditions, so fast. I recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: Works well with T-mobile North America
Reviews.Author: J. Wolanski "Lab Systems Administrator"
Reviews.Content: Dual SIM is nice to run both business line and personal line.  Screen resolution is very clear, but I would recommend installing a third party launcher application because samsung's built in launcher is clunky.

Reviews.Title: Venturing away to unlocked phones for first time
Reviews.Author: PC_Twyla
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an unlocked phone and ordering a phone off of Amazon (I'm tired of having a very limited selection of phones with straight talk for my area).  I'm still waiting on my SIM card to come in (expecting it today) for me to get it started up with my number.  I'm not sure why but I was half expecting the color of it to be more of a hot pink but was pleasantly surprised to see that it is actually a Raspberry Pink color that I love so much!  Now if only I could find a dual layer dark turquoise/black or dark purple/black case to go with my new phone.Will add some updates to this once I get my SIM card and have time to play around with it a little bit and can compare reception of this phone with my husband's phone since we both have the same style phone right now.  I'm definitely looking forward to my signal coming from a different set of towers with this new phone!UPDATE:I got my SIM card in yesterday and was able to get everything set up.  I'm not 100% certain that I have the APN information set up correctly but going to keep playing around with it to see if I can get that fixed.As for the reception....WHY haven't I done this sooner?  I did a test call and with my other phone that works off of a different company's tower I would have to sit and wait for it to finally connect when I pressed the Send button.  Almost immediately after I hit the Send button for my test call my home phone started ringing!  Its going to take some getting adjusting going from a 4.8" screen to a 4.3" screen but the clarity and smoothness of this phone will definitely help to ease the transition!

Reviews.Title: RECEIVED WRONG DEVICE
Reviews.Author: Mackylos
Reviews.Content: I ordered a S4 mini but received a Galaxy Grand 2 instead. How can they mix up an order like that? SMH

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Vonzella H. Greenwade "matrix"
Reviews.Content: I love the phone....just need to know how to use it when I go international ....But so far I am loving it.....

Reviews.Title: excellent machine
Reviews.Author: ivonne prieto
Reviews.Content: thanks friends. i am happy with my cell , it is exactly i want , all very good,  good times of delivery, i am recommending  to all my family and neighboor and friends thanks again

Reviews.Title: Cool Phone
Reviews.Author: MsPhanor25
Reviews.Content: Color is cool and not too girly, the phone has amazing graphics. Fun to use and techy. Very cool phone. However phone freezes from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase ever!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lakisha Gillon
Reviews.Content: This phone did not work from day one it only stays on for like 2 to 3 minutes and keep restarting.

Reviews.Title: Such a cute phone
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: I love this phone because my favorite color is purple and I like how small and easy to hold it is. The only downside from buying an unlocked phone is no warranty and I noticed my phone getting super hot when it's charging and sometimes it freezes. This was only a couple weeks after purchasing it! It is kind of slow at times but it's only a dual processor. For the most part i don't mind it because I don't do a whole lot with my phone except texting mainly. I wish there was an option to purchase a warranty though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lakisha Gillon
Reviews.Content: I'm really loving this phone and it works perfectly fine. I must say that I'm a very very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: iphone goes
Reviews.Author: Chantale
Reviews.Content: takes nice picture but I am an IPhone person. I don't know if one day I will live other phone
